description: Expansion of Jacobi theta constant theta_2^5 /32.
comments: Also number of ways of writing n as a sum of five triangular numbers. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2013
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 102.

K. Ono, S. Robins and P. T. Wahl, On the representation of integers as sums of triangular numbers, Aequationes mathematicae, August 1995, Volume 50, Issue 1-2, pp 73-94; http://www.math.wisc.edu/~ono/reprints/006.pdf.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
